title: Blood Flow in Forest
description: This large-scale painting conveys the dynamic energy of a forest with bold strokes and deep colors.

title: Three-Dimensional Space
description: This artwork investigates depth and form through oil on linen, creating a layered visual experience.

title: Red Melody
description: This painting captures the harmony of color and movement with its bold red tones.

title: Road II
description: A large-scale canvas capturing the journey through abstract landscapes.

title: Road
description: This mixed-media work combines oil on canvas with transparent acrylic board for depth and texture.

title: Dynamic Space
description: This artwork investigates dynamic visual energy through oil on linen.

title: I Go Through the Wildness
description: This oil on canvas painting explores nature’s raw beauty through abstract composition.

title: Relief
description: A compact yet expressive piece in oil on linen.

title: Disorder VI
description: This series of works combines charcoal and oil on tracing paper to depict abstract disorder.

title: Disorder V
description: Charcoal and oil painting on tracing paper creating a layered effect.

title: Disorder IV
description: This piece is part of a larger series focused on chaotic abstraction.

title: Disorder III

title: Disorder II
description: The artwork captures a sense of movement and instability using mixed media.

title: Disorder I
description: Charcoal and oil on tracing paper forming a rich interplay of dark and light contrasts.

title: Moment
description: This piece explores time and perception through expressive marks.

title: A Tree
description: An intimate oil on canvas work capturing the essence of a solitary tree.

title: A Sacred Place II
description: This oil painting reflects the aura of places imbued with meaning.

title: A Sacred Place I
description: Oil on canvas capturing the essence of stillness and reverence.

title: High Land
description: This oil on canvas painting examines the relationship between landforms and atmosphere.

title: Ends of the Earth
description: This artwork captures the solitude and grandeur of distant landscapes.

title: Blood Flow in Forest
short_description: In this scene, I combine the installation with the natural environment to create a melodic space. In the city, the material and mechanical sound of steel can be seen everywhere, but now it appears in the natural environment, colliding with a red melody.
description: This artwork investigates depth and form through oil on linen, creating a layered visual experience.

title: Rotten Tomato & Blueberry Mildew
short_description: When the work is juxtaposed with the space, it feel like a strange creature invading from another planet, squeezing the living space.

title: Memories of Childhood
short_description: My childhood was spent in a beautiful village with a different nature from the city, where mountains, streams, trees, flowers and plants all portrayed a tranquil and peaceful living environment.
description: My childhood was spent in a beautiful village with a different nature from the city, where mountains, streams, trees, flowers and plants all portrayed a tranquil and peaceful living environment. Brick and mud walls, climbing hills and catching fish were all part of the daily routine, and climbing up to the peak of a hill to look out over the landscape. Later, I went to live in the city. As I grew older, my hometown became unfamiliar and I gradually felt alienated. But when I slowed down the peace and immersed myself in it, everything became intimate again. Every scene of my hometown has its own inclusiveness, just like the family waiting for the wanderer back home.

title: background_install

Brick and mud walls, climbing hills and catching fish were all part of the daily routine, and climbing up to the peak of a hill to look out over the landscape. Later, I went to live in the city. As I grew older, my hometown became unfamiliar and I gradually felt alienated. But when I slowed down the peace and immersed myself in it, everything became intimate again. Every scene of my hometown has its own inclusiveness, just like the family waiting for the wanderer back home.
